extDesc.message: Limit the number of tabs in a window. Hide excess tabs and restore them when there is space.

autoMoveDesc.message: Move the tab to a specified position after a delay when visited.

enableAdaptive.message: Auto adjust tab limit by window width

adaptiveDesc.message: When enabled, the system will calculate the best tab count based on window width and pixels per tab.

effectiveDesc.message: (The smaller value between calculated and fixed limit)

emptyDesc.message: When the number of tabs exceeds the limit, the system will hide the least recently used tabs.
